mapper.select: select challenge_id , challenge_category_code , challenge_title , challenge_description , challenge_author_id , challenge_create_date , challenge_delete_date , challenge_is_ended , challenge_target_cnt , (select challenge_category_name from Challenge_Category c where c.challenge_category_code = ch.challenge_category_code) as challenge_category_name , (select count(*) from Comment cm where cm.challenge_id = ch.challenge_id) as challenge_participant_cnt from Challenge ch ORDER BY challenge_create_date desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select challenge_id , challenge_category_code , challenge_title , challenge_description , challenge_author_id , challenge_create_date , challenge_delete_date , challenge_is_ended , challenge_target_cnt , (select challenge_category_name from Challenge_Category c where c.challenge_category_code = ch.challenge_category_code) as challenge_category_name , (select count(*) from Comment cm where cm.challenge_id = ch.challenge_id) as challenge_participant_cnt from Challenge ch where ch.challenge_is_ended = 0 ORDER BY challenge_create_date desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select challenge_id , challenge_category_code , challenge_title , challenge_description , challenge_author_id , challenge_create_date , challenge_delete_date , challenge_is_ended , challenge_target_cnt , (select challenge_category_name from Challenge_Category c where c.challenge_category_code = ch.challenge_category_code) as challenge_category_name , (select count(*) from Comment cm where cm.challenge_id = ch.challenge_id) as challenge_participant_cnt from Challenge ch where ch.challenge_is_ended = 1 ORDER BY challenge_create_date desc LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

select challenge_id , challenge_category_code , challenge_title , challenge_description , challenge_author_id , challenge_create_date , challenge_delete_date , challenge_is_ended , challenge_target_cnt , (select challenge_category_name from Challenge_Category c where c.challenge_category_code = ch.challenge_category_code) as challenge_category_name , (select count(*) from Comment cm where cm.challenge_id = ch.challenge_id) as challenge_participant_cnt from Challenge ch where challenge_id = #{challengeId}
mapper.insert: insert into Challenge (challenge_category_code, challenge_title, challenge_description, challenge_author_id, challenge_create_date, challenge_target_cnt, challenge_delete_date) select s.challenge_category_code, s.challenge_title, s.challenge_description, s.challenge_author_id, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') as challenge_create_date, s.challenge_target_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') as challenge_delete_date from Challenge_Scheduler s where s.challenge_create_date <= NOW() and s.challenge_delete_date >= NOW() or s.challenge_delete_date IS NULL and s.challenge_scheduler_cycle = #{challenge_scheduler_cycle}

insert into Challenge (challenge_category_code, challenge_title, challenge_description, challenge_author_id, challenge_create_date, challenge_target_cnt, challenge_delete_date) select s.challenge_category_code, s.challenge_title, s.challenge_description, s.challenge_author_id, s.challenge_create_date, s.challenge_target_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') as challenge_delete_date from Challenge_Scheduler s where s.challenge_create_date <= NOW() and s.challenge_delete_date >= NOW() or s.challenge_delete_date IS NULL and s.challenge_scheduler_cycle = #{challenge_scheduler_cycle}

insert into Challenge (challenge_category_code, challenge_title, challenge_description, challenge_author_id, challenge_create_date, challenge_target_cnt, challenge_delete_date) select s.challenge_category_code, s.challenge_title, s.challenge_description, s.challenge_author_id, s.challenge_create_date, s.challenge_target_cnt,
DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) - INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59') as challenge_delete_date from Challenge_Scheduler s where s.challenge_create_date <= NOW() and s.challenge_delete_date >= NOW() or s.challenge_delete_date IS NULL and s.challenge_scheduler_cycle = #{challenge_scheduler_cycle}
mapper.update: update Challenge set challenge_is_ended = 1 where challenge_id = #{challengeId} and challenge_is_ended = 0
update Challenge set challenge_is_ended = 1, where challenge_delete_date <= #{currentTime} and challenge_is_ended = 0
